channel.title: Turmoil 562 Innovative Rsps
channel.description:
[url=http://Turmoilps.org]Turmoilps.org[/url] [url=http://turmoilps.org/downloads/Turmoil.jar]http://turmoilps.org/downloads/Turmoil.jar[/url]
[size=24pt][b]Server[/b][/size] Stable Economy Server Awesome shops at home 24/7 VPS Hosted Lag free server Daily Updates All working skills (Summoning) Custom Rewards Systems Comp Cape Custom Skilling Area! Custom Wheel of Fortune! [size=24pt][b]Minigames[/b][/size] Zombie Minigame! Pest control! Fully Working Godwars [size=24pt][b]More Info[/b][/size] Automatic Donation System (Its QUICK!) Perfect Switching Awesome Custom Chat Crowns (Veteran, Helper, Donator, Owner, etc) Multiple Custom PvP Areas (Safe and Unsafe Zones) Custom Player Panel (Kill/Death, My stats, Stats Highscores, Playtime, etc) Great Voting Rewards Full Highscores System Custom Yell Tags for Different Ranks Great Pking and PvM Turmoil Prayer Our Own Lottery! Chaotics [size=24pt][b]Staff Team[/b][/size] We have 3 dedicated owners, Tom, Josh, Jonny. We are doing daily updates that benefit you. We work all day every day to help the server grow, and have better gameplay. Our staff team is currently small, and you can see the list on our forums at http://turmoilps.org/forum/index.php?/topic/57490511-official-staff-list/#entry967384 I hope to see you all in-game, come check us out! [size=24pt][b]Media[/b][/size]

item.title: Turmoil 562 Innovative Rsps
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Can’t even change the run icon sprite. 0/10 would not download.

Seriously. I will not play a server that hasn’t fixed that crap. ALL THE SPRITES FOR THE FIX ARE IN THE CACHE.
It’s literally changing a couple of numbers on the filenames…

This is also a 317 loading higher content.

Read full topic
